TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComponentDiscoveryService

summary.span: 启用组件的设计时枚举。

span.span: Enables enumeration of components at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口的默认实现启用工具箱中组件的设计时枚举。The default implementation of the interface enables design-time enumeration of components in the Toolbox. 可以提供在设计时可使用的其他类型的自定义实现。You could provide a custom implementation that enumerates across other types available at design time. 例如，你的实现可能会枚举特定设计器中存在的组件。For example, your implementation could enumerate the components that are present in a particular designer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来查找派生自 类型的所有类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use to find all the types that derive from the type. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices/CS/Form1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices/VB/Form1.vb#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ICollection GetComponentTypes (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, Type baseType);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection GetComponentTypes(class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, class System.Type baseType) cil managed
Public Function GetComponentTypes (designerHost As IDesignerHost, baseType As Type) As ICollection

param.name: designerHost
param.span: 提供设计时服务的设计器宿主。

span.span: The designer host providing design-time services.

param.name: baseType
param.span: 指定要检索的组件的基类型。

span.span: The base type specifying the components to retrieve.

summary.span: 获取可用组件类型的列表。

span.span: Gets the list of available component types.
The list of available component types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索可用组件类型的列表，该列表是实现 接口的类型。The method retrieves the list of available component types, which are types implementing the interface. 如果 `baseType` 参数 `null`，则检索所有组件;否则，仅返回派生自 `baseType` 的组件类型。If the `baseType` parameter is `null`, all components are retrieved; otherwise, only component types derived from `baseType` are returned. 在为 `designerHost` 参数传递值时，类型解析的作用域限定为 `designerHost`。When you pass in a value for the `designerHost` parameter, type resolution is scoped to `designerHost`. 这意味着，如果某个 的类型在磁盘上，而不在全局程序集缓存中，则其类型将无法通过 `designerHost`加载。This means that if there is a whose type is on disk, and not in the global assembly cache, its type will fail to load through `designerHost`. 如果传入 `designerHost``null`，它将返回可以从全局程序集缓存或 方法查询的所有类型。If you pass in `null` for `designerHost`, it returns all types that can be queried from the global assembly cache or the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法查找派生自 类型的所有类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to find all the types that derive from the type. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices/CS/Form1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerServices/VB/Form1.vb#13)]
